attachments.displayName:
The Tea Party is planning ahead. Trust them.
We are proud to announce that the United States of America still are (exist).
Gratitude has to be shown immediately from every us citizen to the NSA, The Tea Party experts and to the Republicans that did good to the country.
God Bless America! In God we trust.

PS    Next coup?
PPS  Let's have a cup of tea at Fortnum & Mason London, no?
Party there.

object.content:
The Tea Party is planning ahead. Trust them.
We are proud to announce that the United States of America still are (exist).   
Gratitude has to be shown immediately from every us citizen to the NSA, The Tea Party experts and to the Republicans that did good to the country. 
God Bless America! In God we trust. 

PS    Next coup?  
PPS  Let's have a cup of tea at Fortnum & Mason London, no?
          Party there.
